name: Large Round Arthur Dining Table - Weathered Oak
description: Our Arthur Dining Table features a signature curved pedestal base with tripod-style feet. This is the larger of our two round versions, though it is also available in three rectangular variations. Round tables create a more intimate experience while the linear version is more traditional. All the tops feature an indentation that frames the edge, drawing attention to the character in the textured grain of the oak. This version comes in a light Weathered Oak, but it is also available in a warm Burnt Oak finish.
